title: News24.com | Friday's forecast: Perfect stay-at-home weather for the first day of the lockdown
description: It will be perfect stay-in weather on the first day of the lockdown on Friday in most parts of the country, the South African Weather Service has said.
content:
It will be perfect stay-in weather on the first day of the lockdown
on Friday in most parts of the country, the South African
Weather Service has said.
The
weather in your region:
It will be cloudy at times and
